content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-12-26 nightly#153 Please review this PR. At the next toolchain release this diff will land in 'master'.
This seems to be the last nightly for mathlib, and CI seems to be failing (it was cancelled after 6 hours).

This and the other stuck PRs all seem to be stuck at the linting step, which we also see sporadically on mathlib4 CI as well cf. #mathlib4 > slow linting step CI?

#33474 is intended to help us diagnose what's happening there.
